title: IVE ACCIDENTALLY DELETED MY EMAIL
body: ok so a while ago i deleted my email account before thinking of changing my lol email address, im now stuffed because i cant change it to my new email. someone help!!!

replies.body: Please submit an account recovery [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). The email will be sent to the one you provide, and if you are able to prove you are the original owner they can manually change the associated email for you.
